snippet: Hans Rausing, heir to a drink packaging fortune, was arrested after the police found his wife’s decomposing body hidden under a pile of clothing and garbage bags at the couple’s home on July 9.
abstract: Hans Rausing, one of Britain's richest men, is given a suspended 10-month jail sentence after pleading guilty to preventing the burial of his wife Eva, whose body was found in a state of advanced decomposition at their London home.
lead_paragraph: Hans Rausing, heir to a drink packaging fortune, was arrested after the police found his wife’s decomposing body hidden under a pile of clothing and garbage bags at the couple’s home on July 9.

headline.seo: Hans Rausing Is Sentenced for Preventing Wife’s Burial
headline.main: British Millionaire, Undone by Drugs, Is Sentenced for Preventing Wife’s Burial
headline.print_headline: British Millionaire Sentenced for Not Burying His Wife
